cardgame.card_help:
A loli roleplaying card game ofc!

**Commands**
**n!card daily** - Get your daily cards
**n!card display** - Display a card of yours
**n!card list** - Lists your cards
**n!card sell** - Sell a card
**n!card fight** - Fight a user OwO
**n!card transfer** - Transfer a card
